title: 1000 Wins = Play with riot?I
body:
I know that NA was doing this when a summoner was at 1000 wins, twas wondering if OCE does it aswell, i have a group of 4 friends who have surpassed 1000 wins and one of them told me that at 1000 wins you can play with a riot employee, I know they did this back in NA when OCE didnt exist, just boozled if OCE can do it, we can have a 5 man pre made if thats lovely :')

- Championship Zed {{champion:238}} {{item:3153}}

replies.body: They don't have time to play with bronze trash, get better at the game and achieve a respectable rank and maybe one time they'll acknowledge your peasant presence.

> They don't have time to play with bronze trash, get better at the game and achieve a respectable rank and maybe one time they'll acknowledge your peasant presence.

Help it's doing that, thing, again.
IK D: such a scary person, scrutinizes people for being "bronze" Like he is better than them, we are one in the same, no one is better than anyone else, EQUALITY FOR LIFE!

I agree, we are all equal.

Except me. I'm more equal than all of you.
yeah OCE does it. I'm sure sephyre will volunteer.
I shall send you a friend request, then we shall see to it we get those games! I know a person... Probably

Oh can you plz sign me up too, I have also surpassed 1000 wins. Although I seek to play with Agent Mindstar (want to make sure his kills are secured, if you know what I mean, wink wink nudge nudge)

(heh)
